source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_00<tab>Lalai has gleaned new knowledge that may serve you well.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_00<tab>ミルバネス礼拝堂のラライは、新たな情報を得たようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_01<tab>While she waits for Shatotto to wake from her slumber, Lalai would gather further information regarding the falling star. A missive from 269th Order Mendicant Da Za in Revenant's Toll speaks of further golem sightings. Seek out your kobold friend, that you might gain whatever knowledge necessary to stave off attacks that might endanger your beastman friends.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_01<tab>メンディカント269 ダ・ザから暴走ゴーレムの目撃情報が届いた。モードゥナのレヴナンツトール付近で、「メンディカント269 ダ・ザ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_02<tab>A brief conversation with Da Za reveals that the particular golems rampaging in the area appear to be of Mhachi construction. Shatotto, who has once again assumed control of Lalai's consciousness, expresses her disbelief that constructs she herself played a part in creating could be behaving in such a manner, leading the ever-wary Zhai'a Nelhah to doubt her motivations. You set out for the Tangle, where the golems were last sighted, in hopes of finding further answers.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_02<tab>マハのゴーレムが暴走しているらしい。モードゥナのタングル湿原で「シャトト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_03<tab>No sooner have you arrived in the Tangle than Shatotto senses a strong aetheric presence and promptly dashes off in pursuit. Zhai'a Nelhah follows her, meaning to keep an eye on the sorceress and golems both, while bidding you to survey the far side of the bog, to ensure that no menaces of living stone lie in wait.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_03<tab>手分けしてゴーレムを探すことになった。タングル湿原の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA36301 /var>」で見渡してゴーレムを探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_04<tab>Your foray to the southeastern reaches of the swamp proves uneventful. Return to the southwest, that you might see how your companions fared in their own scouting effort.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA36301 /var>の周囲にはゴーレムはいなかった。ふたりが向かったタングル湿原の南西側へ向かおう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive on the scene just in time to rescue the embattled Shatotto and Zhai'a Nelhah from the mindless wrath of a golem gone berserk. Shatotto, in particular, seems uncharacteristically shaken up by the ordeal. Tend to the sorceress and see that neither she nor her host Lalai has suffered grave injury.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_05<tab>ふたりを襲っていたゴーレムを倒した。タングル湿原で「シャトト」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_06<tab>Shatotto and Zhai'a Nelhah have at long last come to something of a mutual understanding, and all it took was staring certain death in the eye together on the field of battle. The conversation turns to the subject of Lalai, and Shatotto chastises the stodgy Hearer for his pathetically hopeless understanding of the fairer sex, causing him to flee from the scene a blithering mess. Shatotto also takes her leave, sensing that she is about to fall back into slumber, and bids you return to Ul'dah to consult with Lalai when she wakes.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_06<tab>襲撃をきっかけに、ザイ・ア・ネルハーとシャトトは打ち解けたようだ。ミルバネス礼拝堂ヘ戻り、「ラライ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_07Lalai welcomes you back to Ul'dah and explains that Shatotto has once again returned to rest, though not before sharing her plans for the next stage of your mission: to wit, she would venture further afield to fend off any potential golem rampages at the pass. Lalai encourages you to continue your studies with due diligence. Though you know not when the call will come, come it will, and Shatotto will be ill pleased if you are not up to the task.

※The next black mage quest will be available from Lalai upon reaching level 68.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SEQ_07シャトトは今後、人里離れたゴーレムの調査に赴きたいらしい。引き続き、修行に励んでおこう。

※黒魔道士のレベルが68以上になると、ミルバネス礼拝堂のラライから、次の黒魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_00<tab>Speak with 269th Order Mendicant Da Za near Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_00<tab>レヴナンツトール付近でメンディカント269 ダ・ザと話す

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_01<tab>Join Shatotto in the Tangle.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_01<tab>タングル湿原のシャトトと合流

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_02<tab>Survey the area from a suitable vantage point.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA36301 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_03<tab>Make your way to the southwestern edge of the Tangle.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_03<tab>タングル湿原の南西側へ向かう

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_04<tab>Aid Shatotto.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_04<tab>シャトトを救助

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Lalai at Milvaneth Sacrarium.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_TODO_05<tab>ミルバネス礼拝堂のラライと話す

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I trust you have not been shirking your studies? Mistress Shatotto expects much of us, and I would not disappoint her.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_000黒魔道士よ。
「星降りの刻」への備えは万全でしょうか……？
私も、シャトト様との交流に全力を注いでおりました。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_001<tab>For my own part, I have called out to her intently time and again within my mind in hopes of conveying any and all knowledge that might avail in staving off this impending disaster. Though she does not respond, I have the distinct sensation that she is listening...in some way or another.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_001心中へ向けて、現在の世界情勢や、
私たちの出会いのことなどを語りかけていたのです。
きっと、シャトト様へも届いていることでしょう……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_002<tab>Doubtless she will return when she sees fit, but in the meanwhile we can ill afford to bide our time. And so, I have taken Zhai'a Nelhah's advice─I can just see the smug grin on his face as I say that─and reached out to our friends.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_002そして、私たちの備えを実行に移すときがきました……！
前回、ザイ・ア・ネルハーの提案で「星降りの刻」の件を、
獣人たちに伝えたのを覚えていますか？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_003<tab>Not moments ago, a postmoogle came by with a missive from our friend Da Za of the 269th Order. As luck would have it, it seems he has knowledge that might serve us well─to wit, reports of recent sightings of rampaging golems.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_003それが功を奏しましたよ！
コボルド族の「メンディカント269ダ・ザ」から、
レターモーグリ経由で、暴走ゴーレムの目撃報告が届いたのです。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_004<tab>I would ask you to go on ahead and see what he knows. I will call for that holier-than-thou Hearer and join you shortly. Not that I am enamored of his company─far from it─but his insights have proven to be not altogether useless on occasion.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_004「レヴナンツトール」付近でダ・ザが待っているとのこと。
私は、ザイ・ア・ネルハーを呼んできますので、
現地で落ち合いましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_005<tab>If only he were not so unbearably smug, the man might almost be─ah! Were you not headed to Revenant's Toll to meet our friend Da Za? We are not exactly suffering from an overabundance of time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_005あなたは先に「レヴナンツトール」へ。
付近で「メンディカント269ダ・ザ」が待っているそうです。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It has been eons─eras, ages, eons! I have heard that the spirit of the legendary Shatotto comes alive again inside Lalai, but could this wondrous tale possibly be true!?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>　お久しぶーり！
僕らー　いっつーも　事件だらーけだねー！
ラライの中にー　シャトト様なんーて　もー　びっくーり！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_011<tab>It is indeed, friend Da Za. She is a capricious type, though, and wakes only when she has a mind to─a fact that I have explained some seven hundred times to this mutton-headed Hearer, who still insists beyond all reason that I should be able to summon her at will.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_011お待たせいたしました。
どうにも、このクソ真面目がくだらないことを、
ウジウジと悩んでおりまして……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_012<tab>You do me discredit, Lalai. I merely <var 1A 02 /var>suggested<var 1A 01 /var> that if there were some means by which we could summon Shatotto at our own convenience─rather than waiting for her to come forth of her own accord─it might serve us in facing the dangers ahead.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_012……くだらないことで悪かったね。
いいから、事態の対処のため、シャトトを呼んでみてくれ。
前回は、呼んでも起きなかったんだろう？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_013<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Summon<var 1A 01 /var> her? You speak of the illustrious founder of my art as if she were a mere serving girl! You will watch your tongue in the presence of your betters, Zhai'a Nelhah, lest...unggghhhhhh!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_013あのときは疲弊していらっしゃったようですし、
暴走ゴーレムの件ですから、今回は大丈夫でしょう……。
……ザイ・ア・ネルハー、くれぐれも暴言は慎むのですよ？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_014<tab>I meant no disrespect. I do not deny the power of your art, nor the good it can do in the right hands. I am simply...
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_014「破壊の力」は、正義のために使えば正しい力となる。
……わかっているさ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_015<tab>...Too stubborn and stupid to fully accept it? Oh well, I suppose none of us are perfect─myself excluded, of course. 269th Order Mendicant Da Za, I presume! Tell me all you have seen or heard about this rampaging golem.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_015……皆さん、調査に協力してくれて、ありがとうございます。
それでは、メンディカント269ダ・ザよ……。
暴走ゴーレムのお話を聞かせていただけますか？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_016<tab>Are my eyes to be believed─trusted, sworn by, believed!? Is this truly the great Shatotto who stands before my eyes? Yes, yes, it must be!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_016シャトト様ーの　言ってーた　変なゴーレム
「タングル湿原」でー　見かけーたのだー！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_017<tab>I...I mean, but of course, my lady! Yes, yes, Da Za will tell all he knows! I saw a strange golem─odd, curious, strange─wandering in the Tangle. And that is not all! It was no ordinary golem─no, no─but rather the same one I saw in a tome handed down from my forebear Da Gu! A golem of ancient Mhach!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_017ご先祖様ー　ダ・グのー　残しーた　魔術書ーに
おんなーじ　ゴーレムの絵　載ってーた！
あれ　魔法都市マハのー　ゴーレムよー！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_018<tab>One of my own creations? Why, that is simply inconceivable! I designed them to be utterly rampage-proof, and left copious instructions to ensure that my loyal apprentices─and <var 1A 02 /var>their<var 1A 01 /var> apprentices, and so on and so forth─would see they stay that way.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_018我が故郷、マハのゴーレムが暴走……？。
マハが得た「魔石」には、暴走を制御する機構を仕込むよう、
生前の私が命じておいたはずですが……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_019<tab>Mayhap your followers were not so diligent in carrying out your orders after your passing? We all know of the chaos and destruction wreaked by Mhachi sorcerers during the War of the Magi. I suspect that poring over age-old documents on the upkeep of golems was the least of their concerns.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_019……君の没後に、うまく指示が行き届かなかったのでは？
魔大戦の時代、マハの連中は相当な無茶もしたと聞く。
混乱の中、数百年前の指示を守る余裕がなかったんだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_020<tab>Forgive me my doubts, Lady Shatotto, but you seem quite partial to your creations...and your countrymen. If we were to find ourselves locked in combat with a golem of Mhach, do I have your assurance you would not hesitate to strike down our foe?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_020…………シャトト、少し、尋ねたい。
どんな連中が作ったんだろうと、君の故郷のゴーレムだ。
君は、破壊できるのか……？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_021<tab>You do not trust me─trust <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>─this I know. I am not deaf to Lalai's ceaseless grumblings. So be it. You cannot help being a simpleton, no more than I can help being the greatest intellect of any era.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_021貴方の心配は、ラライの中で聞いていました。
……それに、我が故郷マハが、私の没後におかした愚行も、
100年前、ククルカが教えてくれましたわ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_022<tab>That old coot Ququruka told me what became of Mhachi after my passing when he communed with me a century ago. Do you think I deny the senseless destruction caused by my descendants─with the art I myself wrought, no less? Of course not. For I, unlike some of my present companions, am not a bloody fool.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_022貴方が、私を疑ってしまうのは、
マハが歴史に刻んだ足跡を思えば、やむないこと……。
ですが、この際はっきり言っておきましょうか。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_023<tab>But even a fool must understand that a tool is only as good or evil as she who would wield it. So answer me this─what could I possibly stand to gain from standing idly by as my own creations wreak havoc on the realm I once called home?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_023私が、マハの国を守るために生み出した黒魔法を、
彼らは、世界を傷つけるのに使った……！
そのような輩に、同胞としての憐憫なぞ欠片もありませんわ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_024<tab>I will grant that there is some sense in what you say. In any event, we thank you for your assistance, Da Za. Rest assured that we shall see to the rogue golems before any harm befalls you and yours. To the Tangle!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_024……その言葉で、少し安心できたよ。
ダ・ザもありがとう、暴走ゴーレムの始末は僕らに任せてくれ。
さあ、「タングル湿原」に向かおう……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_025<tab>Does that overdweller never lighten up? It must be so tiring living each day carrying around a brain of solid stone—burdensome, wearisome, tiring.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_DAZA_000_025それーじゃ　僕はー　ゴーレム探しーに　戻るけーど……
ザイ・ア・ネルハー　また　ウジウージの　グルグルー？
しょうがなーい子　だねー。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_026<tab>You can say that again, my synonym-abusing friend. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You know the man better than I─and for that, I pity you. Is there nothing we can do to buy ourselves a moment's respite from his inane quibbling? Whatever do you suppose is bothering his puny mind?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_026確かに、先ほどの言葉も、心からではないようですね。
できれば、彼ともいい関係を築きたいものですが……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A1_000_001<tab>He is simply in awe of your power.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A1_000_001<tab>どう接していいか悩んでいるみたいだ

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A1_000_002<tab>Mayhap he worries for Lalai?
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A1_000_002<tab>ラライが心配なんだ

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_035<tab>Well, who could blame him? I suppose in some sense I should consider myself fortunate that I did not send him scurrying away with his tail between his legs the moment I first revealed my powers.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_035現代の黒魔法への認識を思えば、それも仕方のないこと。
しかも、この身体は彼の友人のもの……それは心配でしょう。
そんな中で協力してくれるのは、本当にありがたいことです。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_040<tab>Yes, I have observed this as well... Smaller minds are quick to burden themselves with hand-wringing concern for the well-being of others. As if it were not evident that the girl is more than capable of taking care of herself!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_040貴方がたの出会いは、ラライが教えてくれました。
ラライは、彼にとって大切な存在なのですね……。
私が、彼女に害を与える存在ではないと伝わればいいのですが。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_045<tab>In either event, if he insists on tagging along with us, I suppose it would not hurt to win him over─if only so he does not foul things up at the worst possible time.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_045もう少し、彼と話してみるべきかもしれません……。
私は、貴方と彼の、大切な友人の身体を借りているのですから。
それが、宿主に対する責任というものでしょうね。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_046<tab>Anyhow, I do believe we have some golems to smite into oblivion. The Tangle, was it? I'll see you there─and do try not to get lost on the way.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_046……でも、今は、暴走ゴーレム退治に向かうのが最優先です。
ゴーレムがいるのは「タングル湿原」でしたね。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_050<tab>This Shatotto is full of mysteries, but one baffles me the most─just what is it about Lalai's cap that she finds so disagreeable? Was there no custom of wearing headgear in her age?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_050しかし、何故シャトトはラライの帽子が苦手なんだろうな。
……昔は、帽子を被る風習がなかったとか？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_060<tab>These lands were far more dry and agreeable in my day. But I suppose much can change in two millennia─especially without me around to keep things in order.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_060私の生前は、ここは湿地帯ではありませんでした。
月日が移るに連れて、様々な変化が起きているのですね……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_061<tab>But this is no time to get caught up in nostalgia─we have golems to smash! And search for. Not necessarily in that order, I suppose. Yes, I can sense particularly strong aetheric energies coming from...that direction!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_061……おっと、過去語りをしている場合ではありません。
確かに、周囲から強いエーテルを感じます。
手分けして、暴走ゴーレムを探しましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_062<tab>I will accompany Shatotto to ensure that she remains focused on the task at hand. Might you survey the area south of here? These environs afford our foe no end of hiding spots, and I am ill inclined to walk into an ambush.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_062……僕は、シャトトのそばにつくことにするよ。
君は、湿原の南側を調べてくれるかい……？
調査が終わったら、合流しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_065<tab>While I appreciate the support, friend, I assure you I am quite capable of taking care of myself. Might you investigate to the east of here, as we agreed upon?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_065この周囲は、僕らが調べるよ。
君は、もうすこし東の方を探してみてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_068<tab>Come out, come out, my little minions! It's your old mistress, Shatotto!
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_068<tab>確かに、ゴーレムの気配を感じます……！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>You look far and wide, but can discern no sign of golems, rampaging or otherwise. Return to the southwestern reaches of the Tangle and see how Shatotto and Zhai'a Nelhah fare in their search.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SYSTEM_000_065この周囲に、暴走したゴーレムはいないようだ……。
シャトトとザイ・ア・ネルハーが向かった、
「タングル湿原」の南西側へ向かおう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_POPMESSAGE_100_070<tab>The ancient golem lumbers toward you!
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_POPMESSAGE_100_070<tab>敵が襲いかかってきた！！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_070<tab>Ungh... If only this body were my own... I would have razed that oversized block of stone...to the ground...
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_070申し訳ございません……貴方に散々注意をしておきながら……。
……本来の身体ではないのに、無茶をしてはいけませんね。
暴走により、タガが外れたゴーレムの強さを侮っていました。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_071<tab>I suppose I should thank you for coming to my aid. Had I lost consciousness in the midst of battle, I would certainly have been done for...and poor Lalai with me.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_071ザイ・ア・ネルハーも、ありがとうございます……。
貴方の懸命な癒しがなければ、私は……
いえ、ラライの肉体は死を迎えていたでしょう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_073<tab>No, Lady Shatotto. It is <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who owe <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> a debt of gratitude. Had you not drawn the creature's initial strike, I would surely have met an inglorious end. But that is not the least of my failings...
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_073……いや、それは僕もおなじだ。
君が、一手に敵の攻撃を引き受けてくれていたから、
ふたりとも持ちこたえられたんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_074<tab>It is my fault─and mine alone─that we were caught unawares. Though it shames me to say so, my eyes were on you when they should have been watching out for our enemy.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_074それに、こうも追い込まれたのも、僕が油断していたからさ。
……情けない話だが、戦いの最中も敵ではなく、
君が本気で戦っているかどうかに、気を取られていた……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_075<tab>Who is this sorceress who wields such frightful power? Does she truly mean to save our realm─or will she destroy it? These thoughts continued to haunt me...but no more. Seeing you risk your life for me─a humble Hearer you have only just met─I say this with no reservations. You are a paragon of virtue, and a model to all mages, white or black.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_075君は全力で、慣れない敵前で身体を張ってくれたね。
凝り固まった偏執に縛られていた、こんな僕のため……。
……先ほどの非礼を謝罪したい、君は立派な魔道士だ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_076<tab>Why, I do believe those are the most intelligent words I've heard you utter yet. Keep talking like that, and I might yet learn to tolerate your presence.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_076ザイ・ア・ネルハー……。
そう言ってくださって、とても嬉しいです。
私を認めてくれて、ありがとう……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_077<tab>But if you think that means I'm going to give you your precious Lalai back, you'd best think again! We still have a falling star to fend off, do we not?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_077……あ！　でも、無理はしないでくださいね？
私のすべてを認めろとは言いませんよ。
なにせ、貴方の大切な人に憑依しているのですから、私は。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_078<tab>My...<var 1A 02 /var>precious<var 1A 01 /var> Lalai? I have not the slightest idea what you might be implying.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_078…………ちょっと待て、とても大きな語弊があるようだが。
た……大切な人、というのは……？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_079<tab>You wouldn't, would you...? Ahem. Was it not your grand dream to see the white and the black─the arts of healing and destruction─united for the common good? So says Lalai, at the very least. Is the girl not an invaluable piece to the future you would realize?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_079ラライのことですが……。
貴方は「癒しの力」と「破壊の力」の融和を願っているとか。
目的を成すため、ラライは失ってはならぬ大切な人なのでは？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_080<tab>This is all well and true, but...“invaluable” and “precious” have different connotations! M-Mayhap not in your time, but the meanings of words evolve over time, you see, and...
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_080……あ、ああ、「破壊の力」と「癒しの力」の融和には、
黒魔道士であるラライが不可欠だが……た、大切とは……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_081<tab>Ahem! What I am saying is, of course Lalai is a friend and ally, but the same could be said of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here, and... Wh-Which is not to say I do not want to see her again, of course─only that...oh, never mind.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_081いや、別に、大切じゃないというわけでもないが、
それは)) (( )) 02 /var>も同じで……。
あ、だからといってラライがどうでもいいわけでも……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_082<tab>At any rate, I do believe we've done all we can here. Lady Shatotto, please forgive me for having doubted you. Henceforth, I promise that I will aid you in whatever way I can. And with that, I do believe I must be off...er, somewhere.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_082……とにかく、シャトト、先ほどの非礼を許して欲しい。
改めて、僕も「星降りの刻」に対処するため力を尽くすよ。
……で、では、僕はこれで……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_083<tab>One last thing, if I may, Lady Shatotto. While you are awake and speaking with us, what becomes of Lalai's consciousness? That is to say, is she still in there...listening?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_083シャトト、君が目覚めているときって、
ラライの意識はどうなっているんだ……？
僕らの会話などは……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_084<tab>What a curious question. She is slumbering in the recesses of her mind, much as I am when she is awake. But to answer your question: no, she is not <var 1A 02 /var>listening<var 1A 01 /var>─though we do have some rather stimulating conversations from time to time. If you'd like, I can share the details...
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_084彼女の意識は眠っていますので、会話は聞いていません。
ラライが目覚めた後に、私から伝えることはできますが……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_085<tab>N-No! I mean, never mind! I really must be getting off to─right! That place I was going.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_ZHAIANELHAH_000_085いや、いい、大丈夫だ。
まったくもって大丈夫だから、この話はこれで終わりにしよう。
それじゃ、今度こそ失礼するよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_086<tab><var 08 E905 ((Are all men in this era so odd?)) ((What a curious man.)) /var> At any rate, I feel my consciousness beginning to wane. Lalai will be waking from slumber ere long, and I would return to Ul'dah before she does. I suggest you do the same—your friend has much she wishes to discuss with you.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_SHATOTTO_000_086…………？
まあ、私たちも「ウルダハ」に戻るとしましょうか。
そろそろ私も活動の限界が近いですし……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_090<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As you might have surmised, it is I, Lalai. Mistress Shatotto returned to her repose not moments ago.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_090今回も、おつかれ様でしたね……。
シャトト様は、先ほど眠りについたところですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_091<tab>Before drifting off to slumber, she imparted to me some details regarding what she sees as the next phase of our task. To wit, she would have us venture further afield to investigate any golem menaces that might be stirring out of eyeshot.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_091最後に、新たな指示を頂戴しました。
都市付近でゴーレムが目撃されるのを待つだけではなく、
今後は、人里から離れた場所を捜索していきたいそうです。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_092<tab>Speaking of menaces, whatever became of that stone-headed Hearer? I suppose it is too much to hope that Mistress Shatotto finally set his robes alight?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_092……ところで、どうでしたか、ザイ・ア・ネルハーは。
シャトト様に失礼な口を利いてはいなかったでしょうか？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A2_000_001<tab>He has come to respect Lady Shatotto.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A2_000_001<tab>シャトトを信頼すると決めたようだ

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A2_000_002<tab>He seems to have...feelings...for you.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_A2_000_002<tab>ラライのことが大切なようだ

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_095<tab>I daresay it took him long enough. Still, we cannot hold the man's ignorance against him─not all of us are blessed with burgeoning intellects.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_095それはよかった！
あの強情っ張りも困ったものですよ……。
まあ、シャトト様の偉大さに気づけたなら許してあげましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_100<tab>I...I will assume I misheard you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. On the off chance I did not, pray inform the man that he had best not act upon these <var 1A 02 /var>feelings<var 1A 01 /var> in my presence, lest I <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> like scorching his precious flowing locks from his scalp!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_100…………は？　なにを気持ち悪いことを。
あんな堅苦しい男に、大切になどされたくありません。
それに私ではなく、シャトト様とのことを聞いたのですよ？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_101<tab>Anyhow, I trust you will keep me informed if our Hearer friend exhibits any more impertinent behavior. I will think of suitable retribution─I daresay putting him to sleep and hiding his glasses would send a clear message, and be rather amusing no less.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_101もしも、あの男がまた失礼なことを言ったら教えてください。
スリプルをかけて顔中に落書きしたうえで、
丸焦げにしてやりますから！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_102<tab>In any event, I should return to my research─as should you. Shatotto will doubtless call upon us before long, and our powers must be primed for the occasion.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM650_02590_LALAI_000_102あなたは引き続き、
「星降りの刻」に向けて集中してくださいね。
時間が許す限り、どうか修行を怠らぬように……。
